title: Metaverse-Based Online Science Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific knowledge and smartphone usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Science education utilizing core features of metaverse platforms in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, combining real-time video lectures with metaverse experiences in a blended learning design

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain molecular structure analysis processes with 80% or higher accuracy using AR-based simulation tools
Learners successfully perform chemical reaction experiment procedures in a VR environment at least three times
Learners complete a project solving science problems with team members in a metaverse collaboration space

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
